title: RX 5700 vs RTX Super - Should AMD OR NVIDIA Be Worried?
description: The NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super and RTX 2060 Super will soon find themselves in benchmarks against the RX 5700 XT and RX 5700.  But which will end up the winner?  We ended up doing a quick and fun little experiment before the RX 5700 review by using AMD's own public performance numbers to see how things MIGHT line up.  But we'll know how accurate these projections are in a few days.  ;)    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Dark Rock Slim:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by NVIDIA and AMD. This video is sponsored by BeQuiet. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- #rx5700 #rtx2070super #rtx2060super #hardwarecanucks
